translations: 游手好闲的人；懒鬼；偷懒者

sentences.sentence: "Stand up and repeat 'TIS THE VOICE OF THE SLUGGARD,'" said the Gryphon.
sentences.translation: “站起来背《懒汉的话》。”鹰头怪说。

sentences.sentence: As a door turns on its hinges, so a sluggard turns on his bed.
sentences.translation: 门在枢纽转动，懒惰人在床上也是如此。

sentences.sentence: I will not like a sluggard wear out my youth in idleness at home.
sentences.translation: 我不愿意象个懒人一样待在家里，游手好闲地把我的青春消磨掉。
